Text:
"Files" tab - right-click on file you don't need - choose "Don't download". (uTorrent/BitTorrent).
Other torrent-programs offer very similar step.
130MB for each file seems really small...?

137 MB is 272p version.
162 MB is 480p version.

Which version one would download is matter of choice and playback platform (explained in Description).

So, thanks for your  thanks, as first. And - idiots which crawl out of the woodwork every now and then drive me mad with their sheer, unprovoked, undeserved spreading of verbal diarrhea.

Thank you for taking time out of your day to upload these SoA episodes twentyforty. You are making alot of pissed off people VERY happy. You freakin' rock!!

@CrystalW: I kept iPod version for old times sake (and because of your kindness).  Ones who need computer/PS3 version can choose 480p one.
Regarding the time - like encoding two different titles, instead of one... but I do save one upload slot on paid server - 1 torrent use 1 slot - two separate torrents would use two slots - and two slots is what I have. It saves time to ones who wait for torrents of other TV shows.
